sentences.en: The anaesthetic made his whole face go numb.
sentences.cn: 麻醉剂使他整个脸都失去了知觉。

sentences.en: a sacred vow
sentences.cn: 神圣的誓言

sentences.en: the miraculous powers of sacred relics
sentences.cn: 圣物的神奇力量

sentences.en: Certain animals were considered sacred.
sentences.cn: 有些动物被认为是神圣的。

phrases.cn: 圣心（即耶稣之心，爱的源泉）

sentences.en: They killed four policemen while robbing a bank.
sentences.cn: 他们抢劫一家银行的时候杀了4名警察。

sentences.en: A 77-year-old woman was robbed at knifepoint.
sentences.cn: 一名77岁老妪遭到持刀抢劫。

sentences.en: terminal cancer
sentences.cn: 晚期癌症

sentences.en: What you definitely need: helmet, appropriate clothing, phone, passport (with visas), water and snacks.
sentences.cn: 必需品：头盔，适量的衣物，电话，护照和签证，水和点心。

sentences.en: Spending on information technology has declined.
sentences.cn: 用于信息技术的支出减少了。

sentences.en: Car sales have declined by a quarter.
sentences.cn: 汽车销量下滑了四分之一。

sentences.en: After the war, the city declined in importance.
sentences.cn: 战后这座城市的重要性下降了。

sentences.en: At a minimum, we must recruit two new teachers.
sentences.cn: 我们最起码应该招两名新教师。

sentences.en: powerful institutions such as world banks
sentences.cn: 诸如世界银行之类的强大机构

sentences.en: the Institution of Electrical Engineers
sentences.cn: 电机工程师学会

sentences.en: She loves him unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 她无条件地爱他。

sentences.en: No, he worships you, unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 不对，他崇拜你，无条件地。

sentences.en: But of course, we also want to be loved - we want to be rewarded unconditionally without any contingencies whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 但当然，我们都想被喜爱,-我们都想无条件的得到报酬,没有任何别的可能。

sentences.en: First, you should equip yourself with the knowledge you can acquire. Only thus can you be confident of yourself.
sentences.cn: 第一，你应该用你学习到的知识来装备自己，只有这样你才能相信自己。

sentences.en: The firm's employees were expecting large bonuses.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的雇员们正期待着大笔的奖金。

phrases.cn: 会计事务所，会计师事务所

sentences.en: He made a fortune selling property in Spain.
sentences.cn: 他在西班牙卖房产，发了大财。

sentences.en: My first painting sold for £25, a small fortune then for an art student.
sentences.cn: 我的第一幅画卖了25英镑，这在当时对一个学艺术的学生来说是一大笔钱。

sentences.en: He died in poverty in 1947, but his art is worth a fortune .
sentences.cn: 1947年他在贫困中死去，但是现在他的美术作品值大钱了。

sentences.en: Suddenly, he reversed himself completely.
sentences.cn: 突然，他彻底改变了立场。

phrases.cn: adv. 相反，向相反方向，倒（退），逆（行、转等）

sentences.en: Immediately his heart rate (= the number of beats per minute ) increased.
sentences.cn: 他的心率立即加快了。

sentences.en: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.cn: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

phrases.cn: 赶上最后期限；按期完成

sentences.en: They submitted their reports to the chancellor yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天向财政大臣提交了他们的报告。

sentences.en: See Appendix 2.6.
sentences.cn: 见附录2.6。

sentences.en: Donald’s been given an extension to finish his thesis.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德获准延期完成他的论文。

sentences.en: Iron-ox is another name for tractor.
sentences.cn: 铁牛是拖拉机的别名。

sentences.en: This kind of tractor is easy to start.
sentences.cn: 这种拖拉机很容易发动。

sentences.en: This kind of walking tractor runs on diesel oil.
sentences.cn: 这种手扶拖拉机靠柴油运转。

sentences.en: She was jealous of his wealth.
sentences.cn: 她嫉妒他的富有。

sentences.en: ...a garden spade.
sentences.cn: …一把花园里使用的锹。

sentences.en: To make an aluminum can, that takes energy.
sentences.cn: 为了制造一个铝罐，就得消耗能源。

sentences.en: And she sat and sat on that aluminum throne ever since.
sentences.cn: 自那以后，她就一直坐在那个铝制的宝座上。

sentences.en: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.cn: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

sentences.en: a sardine tin
sentences.cn: 沙丁鱼罐头

phrases.cn: [美国英语]使用警徽的(指凭此可得到免费用餐等特殊照顾)

sentences.en: The recent rise in crime is a matter of considerable public concern.
sentences.cn: 近来犯罪增多是民众极为关切的事。

sentences.en: In her last days the poet expressed concern for her father.
sentences.cn: 在生命最后的日子里，诗人表达了她对父亲的关切。

phrases.cn: ◎从事,忙于(常与with, about, in, over连用)
对…表示担心/忧虑；使（自己）关心…

sentences.en: In 1918 British women got the right to vote.
sentences.cn: 1918年，英国妇女获得了选举权。

sentences.en: ‘You can trust me,’ he said. Jane looked sceptical.
sentences.cn: “你可以相信我。”他说。而简看上去一脸怀疑。

sentences.en: She laid her hands on her swollen belly.
sentences.cn: 她把手放在隆起的肚子上。

sentences.en: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

sentences.en: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.cn: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.en: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.cn: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

phrases.cn: 在这种情况下；既然这样
